ROW.DATDSC: SELECT "CW_RJZMXB"."ORG", "CW_RJZMXB"."ACC", "CW_RJZMXB"."LSH", "CW_RJZMXB"."MXXH", "CW_RJZMXB"."KMBH", "CW_RJZMXB"."LXBH", "CW_RJZMXB"."LXXH", "CW_RJZMXB"."JE", "CW_RJZMXB"."JEFX", decode( "CW_RJZMXB"."JEFX", '借', "CW_RJZMXB"."JE", null ) JFJE, decode( "CW_RJZMXB"."JEFX", '贷', "CW_RJZMXB"."JE", null ) DFJE, "CW_RJLXMXB"."KXMC", "CW_RJLXB"."RJLX", "CW_RJZMXB"."YM1", "CW_RJZMXB"."YM2", "CW_KMB"."KMMC" KMMC, '' xtbh FROM "CW_RJZMXB", "CW_RJLXMXB", "CW_RJLXB", "CW_KMB" WHERE ( "CW_RJZMXB"."ORG" = '[%SYS_ORGID]' ) and ( "CW_RJZMXB"."ACC" = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( "CW_RJZMXB"."LSH" = '[%LSH]' ) and ( "CW_KMB"."ORG"(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]' ) and ( "CW_KMB"."ACC"(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( "CW_KMB"."KMBH"(+) = "CW_RJZMXB"."KMBH" ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."ORG"(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]' ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."ACC"(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."LXBH"(+) = "CW_RJZMXB"."LXBH" ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."MXXH"(+) = "CW_RJZMXB"."LXXH" ) and ( "CW_RJLXB"."ORG"(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]' ) and ( "CW_RJLXB"."ACC"(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( "CW_RJLXB"."LXBH"(+) = "CW_RJLXMXB"."LXBH" ) order by "CW_RJZMXB"."LSH", "CW_RJZMXB"."MXXH"

ROW.NAME: 单位类型
查询日记帐打印数据
ROW.DATDSC: SELECT a.yy,a.mm,a.dd,a.pch,a.zy,a.kmbh,a.dwbh,a.dwmc,a.je,a.jefx,a.jsfs,a.fkrq, b.mxxh,b.lxbh,b.lxxh,b.ym1,b.ym2,b.je mxje,b.jefx mxjefx, nvl(c.rjlx,b.kmbh) rjlx,nvl(c.kxmc,cw_pack4.kmmc( a.sbh, a.zth, b.KMBH )) kxmc, (select khyh from si_dwb d where a.sbh=d.sbh and a.zth=d.zth and a.dwbh=d.dwbh) dwkmyhmc FROM CW_RJZB a, CW_RJZMXB b,( SELECT "CW_RJLXB"."RJLX","CW_RJLXMXB"."KXMC","CW_RJLXMXB"."LXBH","CW_RJLXMXB"."MXXH" FROM "CW_RJLXMXB" , "CW_RJLXB" WHERE ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."ORG" = '[%SYS_ORGID]' ) AND ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."ACC" = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."SBH" = "CW_RJLXB"."SBH" ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."ZTH" = "CW_RJLXB"."ZTH" ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."LXBH" = "CW_RJLXB"."LXBH" ) ) c WHERE ( a.ORG = '[%SYS_ORGID]' AND a.ACC = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( a.SBH = b.SBH and a.ZTH = b.ZTH and a.lsh=b.lsh) and ( a.ORG = b.ORG and a.ACC = b.ACC ) and a.lsh='[%LSH]' and b.LXBH = c.LXBH(+) and b.lxxh=c.mxxh(+) order by b.mxxh

ROW.NAME: 对应科目信息
ROW.DATDSC: select name from v_accitem where id=(select kmbh from cw_rjzb where lsh='[%DYLSH]' and org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and acc='[%SYS_ACCID]') and org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and acc='[%SYS_ACCID]'

ROW.NAME: 更新打印标志信息
ROW.DATDSC: update cw_rjzb set DYBZ='1',DYRQ=sysdate,DYR='[%DYR]' where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' and lsh='[%LSH]'
